20101206013359.000|20101206013400.000|CCO|>> Reporter: JULIAN ASSANGE IS
20101206013400.000|20101206013401.000|CCO|AT THE EYE OF THE STORM OVER THE
20101206013401.000|20101206013402.429|CCO|WICK WHICH LEAKS DOCUMENTS, BUT

20101206013403.857|20101206013405.286|CCO|IS A 23-YEAR-OLD ARMY PRIVATE

20101206013406.714|20101206013408.143|CCO|IN AN INCRIMINATING TEXT MESSAGE
20101206013408.143|20101206013409.571|CCO|LAST MAY, MANNING CLAIMED CREDIT
20101206013409.571|20101206013411.000|CCO|FOR POSSIBLY THE LARGEST DATA
20101206013411.000|20101206013414.333|CCO|SPILLAGE IN AMERICAN HISTORY.
20101206013414.333|20101206013417.667|CCO|>> TO THIS DAY, I DON'T REALLY
20101206013417.667|20101206013421.000|CCO|KNOW WHAT MOTIVATED HIM TO SEND
20101206013421.000|20101206013422.667|CCO|THAT FIRST FATEFUL E-MAIL.
20101206013422.667|20101206013424.333|CCO|>> Reporter: ADRIAN LAMO, AKA
20101206013424.333|20101206013426.000|CCO|THE HOMELESS HACKER, BECAUSE HE
20101206013426.000|20101206013427.667|CCO|MOVES FROM UNFURNISHED APARTMENT
20101206013427.667|20101206013429.333|CCO|TO UNFURNISHED APARTMENT, IS A
20101206013429.333|20101206013431.000|CCO|CULT FIGURE ON THE INTERNET.
20101206013431.000|20101206013432.429|CCO|A COMPUTER GENIUS WHO SUFFERS
20101206013432.429|20101206013433.857|CCO|FROM ASPERGER'S SYNDROME, WHICH
20101206013433.857|20101206013435.286|CCO|AFFECTS HIS SPEECH.
20101206013435.286|20101206013436.714|CCO|MANNING REACHED OUT TO HIM
20101206013436.714|20101206013438.143|CCO|ELECTRONICALLY FROM IRAQ, WHERE
20101206013438.143|20101206013439.571|CCO|HE WAS A LOW-LEVEL INTELLIGENCE
20101206013439.571|20101206013441.000|CCO|ANALYST.
20101206013441.000|20101206013443.500|CCO|IF YOU HAD UNPRECEDENTED ACCESS
20101206013443.500|20101206013446.000|CCO|TO CLASSIFIED NETWORKS 14 HOURS
20101206013446.000|20101206013448.500|CCO|A DAY, SEVEN DAYS A WEEK FOR
20101206013448.500|20101206013451.000|CCO|EIGHT-PLUS MONTHS, WHAT WOULD
20101206013451.000|20101206013452.429|CCO|YOU DO?:
20101206013452.429|20101206013453.857|CCO|AT FIRST LAMO DIDN'T TAKE HIM
20101206013453.857|20101206013455.286|CCO|SERIOUSLY.
20101206013455.286|20101206013456.714|CCO|BUT THEN --
20101206013456.714|20101206013458.143|CCO|>> THE POINT AT WHICH P.F.C.
20101206013458.143|20101206013459.571|CCO|MANNING DISCLOSED TO ME THAT HE
20101206013459.571|20101206013501.000|CCO|HAD LEAKED SEVERAL HUNDRED
20101206013501.000|20101206013503.500|CCO|THOUSAND DIPLOMATIC CABLES WAS A
20101206013503.500|20101206013506.000|CCO|POINT AT WHICH I BEGAN TO
20101206013506.000|20101206013508.500|CCO|BELIEVE THAT THERE WAS A CERTAIN
20101206013508.500|20101206013511.000|CCO|DEGREE OF GRAVITY TO THE
20101206013511.000|20101206013512.429|CCO|SITUATION.
20101206013512.429|20101206013513.857|CCO|>> Reporter: FROM HIS POST
20101206013513.857|20101206013515.286|CCO|SOUTHEAST OF BAGHDAD, THIS LOWLY
20101206013515.286|20101206013516.714|CCO|PRIVATE COULD READ SECRET CABLES
20101206013516.714|20101206013518.143|CCO|ARE FROM AMERICAN EMBASSIES
20101206013518.143|20101206013519.571|CCO|AROUND THE WORLD.
20101206013519.571|20101206013521.000|CCO|>> PROBABLY THIS ONE PERSON
20101206013521.000|20101206013522.667|CCO|MANAGED TO PRY LOOSE MORE
20101206013522.667|20101206013524.333|CCO|GRANULAR DETAIL OF INDIVIDUALLY
20101206013524.333|20101206013526.000|CCO|CLASSIFIED DOCUMENTS THAN
20101206013526.000|20101206013527.667|CCO|ANYBODY ELSE.
20101206013527.667|20101206013529.333|CCO|>> Reporter: TOM BLANTON, WHO
20101206013529.333|20101206013531.000|CCO|RUNS THE NATIONAL SECURITY
20101206013531.000|20101206013533.000|CCO|ACHIEVE OF DECLASSIFIED
20101206013533.000|20101206013535.000|CCO|GOVERNMENT DOCUMENTS, SAYS ALL
20101206013535.000|20101206013537.000|CCO|MANNING DID WAS SURF A
20101206013537.000|20101206013539.000|CCO|CLASSIFIED NETWORK THE WAY THE
20101206013539.000|20101206013541.000|CCO|REST OF US SURF THE INTERNET.
20101206013541.000|20101206013542.667|CCO|>> I THINK PROBABLY WHAT HE DID
20101206013542.667|20101206013544.333|CCO|WAS SOMETHING MORE LIKE A GOOGLE
20101206013544.333|20101206013546.000|CCO|SEARCH, WHERE HE ENTERED SOME
20101206013546.000|20101206013547.667|CCO|KEY WORDS, SOME KEY TERMS, AND
20101206013547.667|20101206013549.333|CCO|BY ENTERING THOSE SEARCH TERMS
20101206013549.333|20101206013551.000|CCO|HE CAME UP WITH CABLES FROM ALL
20101206013551.000|20101206013552.250|CCO|OVER THE PLACE.
20101206013552.250|20101206013553.500|CCO|>> Reporter: OUT CAME A QUARTER
20101206013553.500|20101206013554.750|CCO|MILLION DOCUMENTS, MOST OF THEM
20101206013554.750|20101206013556.000|CCO|HAVING NOTHING TO DO WITH
20101206013556.000|20101206013557.250|CCO|MANNING'S JOB.
20101206013557.250|20101206013558.500|CCO|THERE ARE SO MANY IT'S
20101206013558.500|20101206013559.750|CCO|IMPOSSIBLE FOR ANY ONE HUMAN TO
20101206013559.750|20101206013601.000|CCO|READ ALL QUARTER MILLION, HE
20101206013601.000|20101206013604.333|CCO|WROTE LAMO.
20101206013604.333|20101206013607.667|CCO|>> THE SENSE OF IMPORTANCE, THE
20101206013607.667|20101206013611.000|CCO|SENSE OF ALMOST POWER, I THINK,
20101206013611.000|20101206013612.429|CCO|WAS ADDICTING TO HIM.
20101206013612.429|20101206013613.857|CCO|>> Reporter: BUT BEING ABLE TO
20101206013613.857|20101206013615.286|CCO|ROAM AT WILL THROUGH STATE
20101206013615.286|20101206013616.714|CCO|DEPARTMENT CABLES IS ONLY HALF
20101206013616.714|20101206013618.143|CCO|THE STORY.
20101206013618.143|20101206013619.571|CCO|MANNING WAS THEN ABLE TO
20101206013619.571|20101206013621.000|CCO|DOWNLOAD THEM ONTO A C.D. AND
20101206013621.000|20101206013623.500|CCO|SEND THEM OFF TO WIKILEAKS.
20101206013623.500|20101206013626.000|CCO|>> "I WOULD COME IN WITH MUSIC
20101206013626.000|20101206013628.500|CCO|ON A C.D. LABELED WITH AS WELL
20101206013628.500|20101206013631.000|CCO|LIKE LADY GA," HE WROTE TO
20101206013631.000|20101206013632.429|CCO|LAMO, "ERASE THE MUSIC, THEN
20101206013632.429|20101206013633.857|CCO|WRITE A COMPRESSED FILE
20101206013633.857|20101206013635.286|CCO|CONTAINING THE DIPLOMATIC
20101206013635.286|20101206013636.714|CCO|DOCUMENTS."
20101206013636.714|20101206013638.143|CCO|THEN HE APPARENTLY TOOK THE CD
20101206013638.143|20101206013639.571|CCO|WITH HIM WHEN HE WENT HOME TO
20101206013639.571|20101206013641.000|CCO|BOSTON ON LEAVE AND PASSED IT TO
20101206013641.000|20101206013643.000|CCO|WIKILEAKS.
20101206013643.000|20101206013645.000|CCO|NO ONE SUSPECTED A THING,
20101206013645.000|20101206013647.000|CCO|MANNING CROWED, UNTIL LAMO
20101206013647.000|20101206013649.000|CCO|TURNED THE TEXT MESSAGES OVER TO
20101206013649.000|20101206013651.000|CCO|THE ARMY.
20101206013651.000|20101206013652.111|CCO|>> I BELIEVED THAT HIS ACTIONS
20101206013652.111|20101206013653.222|CCO|WERE ENDANGERING LIVES.
20101206013653.222|20101206013654.333|CCO|>> Reporter: MANNING IS NOW IN
20101206013654.333|20101206013655.444|CCO|CUSTODY WHILE INVESTIGATORS
20101206013655.444|20101206013656.556|CCO|PREPARE CHARGES THAT COULD SEND

20101206013658.778|20101206013659.889|CCO|PENTAGON.
20101206013659.889|20101206013701.000|CCO|>> Mitchell: OUR LATEST CBS NEWS
